mapper.sql: /* commonSearchColumns */ m.no AS "no", m.no AS "id", m.parent_no AS parentNo, m.sort_no AS sortNo, m.menu_name AS menuName, m.menu_name AS "text", m.menu_path AS menuPath, m.image_path AS imagePath, m.open_window_yn AS openWindowYn, m.login_yn AS loginYn, m.use_yn AS useYn, m.description AS description, m.user_id AS userId, m.created AS created, m.lastModified AS lastModified
mapper.select: /* Menu.getMenuMaxNoList */ SELECT MAX(m.no) AS maxNo FROM menu m
mapper.insert: /* Menu.insertMenu */ INSERT INTO menu ( parent_no, sort_no, menu_name, menu_path, image_path, open_window_yn, login_yn, use_yn, description, user_id, created, lastmodified) VALUES ( #{parentNo}, #{sortNo}, #{menuName}, #{menuPath}, #{imagePath}, #{openWindowYn}, #{loginYn}, #{useYn}, #{description}, #{userId}, now(), now());
mapper.update:
/* Menu.updateMenu */ UPDATE menu SET
parent_no = #{parentNo},
parent_no = 0,
sort_no = #{sortNo},
menu_name = #{menuName},
menu_path = #{menuPath},
image_path = #{imagePath},
open_window_yn = #{openWindowYn},
login_yn = #{loginYn},
use_yn = #{useYn},
description = #{description},
user_id = #{userId},
lastModified = now() WHERE "no" = #{no}
